item.description:
February 15-21 is Extreme Beer Fest Week.

A few Red Sox Natives and Happy Hourers will be attending this Annual Beer Brunch at Cambridge Commons Restaurant on Mass. Avenue between Harvard Square and Porter Square only a 10 minute walk from two Red Line stations.

Every year the Alstrom Brothers and the Extreme Beer Fest Volunteers gather at a local Boston area restaurant for brunch to close out Extreme Beer Fest Week. This years brunch is sponsored by Dogfish Head Craft Brewery. The Dogfish crew will be in the house.

Waffles, pancakes, eggs, craft brews, bloddy mary's...

Pay for what you eat and drink.

We will meet at the bar between 12 - 12:15 pm and be seated at 12:30 pm Please Rsvp if you will be joining us. No Maybe RSVPs taken.





Check out mbta.com/ or http://www.hopstop.co... to create your route by public transit. Aquarium (blue line), Haymarket (green & orange lines), State (orange & blue lines), Government Center (blue & green lines), and South Station (red line & commuter rail).

www.redsoxnatives.com

The Red Sox Natives are regulars here for Beer Dinners, Game Watching, Special Events, Eating and Drinking Beer.



PLEASE MAINTAIN YOUR OWN TAB OR PAY AS YOU ORDER - THANK YOU
item.how_to_find_us: At The Bar wearing A Red Red Sox Hat or Ask Hostess for Red Sox Natives/Boston Happy Hour table
item.name: Beer Advocate's Post Extreme-Beer-Fest-Hair-of-the-Dog Brunch
